resources.string: Welcome! Take this fun quiz to check your knowledge on cooking!
1. Fry food lightly then stew it in a closed container is what method in cooking:
2. To cook food in oil or fat is called
3. What is the safe internal temperature for cooked chicken?
Boil food for an extended amount of time
Boil food for a minimal amount of time
Cook food in a deep pot
Place hot food into an ice bath
5. Cook pasta to al dente, what does this mean?
Place pasta in a frying pan
Add salt to your pasta when cooking
Cook pasta until firm to the bite
6. Which of the following are French Mother Sauces (Multiple Choice)
7a When following a recipe, what is the first thing to do
Clean your kitchen to allow space to cook
Get some help from a friend or partner
Cook on high heat until food is caramelized
Roast in a pan until juices run clear
Grill until you have uniform grill marks
Cook in 1 to 2 tablespoons of oil
9. What is the required ingredient for an aioli?
